original_title: Sathosa reduces prices of several essential items
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Lanka Sathosa Limited announced that the prices of twelve essential goods will be reduced with effect from Saturday (16), and consumers can purchase these items from Sathosa outlets located island-wide.
White Sugar (1kg) has been reduced by Rs. 60/- to Rs. 275/-.
Imported Canned Fish (425g) has been reduced by Rs. 55/- to Rs. 595/-.
Watana Dhal (1kg) has been reduced by Rs. 40/- to Rs. 225/-.
Local Potatoes (1kg) has been reduced by Rs. 15/- to Rs. 300/-.
Mettupalayam Potato (1kg) has been reduced by Rs. 15/- to Rs. 300/-.
Local Canned Fish (425g) has been reduced by Rs. 15/- to Rs. 530/-.
Bread Flour (1kg) has been reduced by Rs. 12/- to Rs. 195/-.
Imported Canned Fish (155g) has been reduced by Rs. 10/- to Rs. 280/-.
Lanka Sathosa Milk Powder (400g) has been reduced by Rs. 8/- to Rs. 940/-.
